text: $0.99 taco Tuesday! Is that enough said? What a delight. They are super friendly and quick. Good place to take kids. They have a tv. Cash only. Clean! And a wide menu to choose from.

This is now my favorite taco place!!! Their meat is amazing and the food is authentic as it can get! Highly recommend to anyone looking for great food for a good/cheap price! The staff is also friendly and very helpful. I will be coming back!
Very good tacos de pastor and asada! Very friendly staff, and reasonable prices! Would recommend for a quick lunch. Cash only.
